!Trader Natasha: Wow! You're an adventurer? Really? I envy you! You earn honor and wealth... and everyone loves you! Sigh...! I hate my life! Everyday I sit in this store, saying the same things over and over again... "Welcome!" and "Have a nice day!"... Everyday, it's the same thing! I'm so bored!
